basics.addContext: {label}: Use {symbol} to specify files for context (e.g., {example}) to target specific files or folders.
basics.shellMode: {label}: Execute shell commands via {symbol} (e.g., {example}) or use natural language (e.g. {natural}).

shortcuts.altLeftRight: Jump through words in the input
shortcuts.ctrlJLinux: New line (Alt+Enter works for certain linux distros)
shortcuts.ctrlS: Enter selection mode to copy text

mcpCommand: Model Context Protocol command (from external servers)
shortcutsDocs: For a full list of shortcuts, see {docsPath}
